dct_title_s: Map of the lower portion of the Grand River Basin showing availability of underground water
dct_alternative_sm: Ohio water plan inventory. Underground water resources. Grand River Basin (Lower portion)
dct_description_sm: Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the lower portion of the Grand River Basin and the quality of underground water.
Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.
"Prepared by HENRY L. PREE, JR. Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"
